content: quick and easy this classy cowl will have your neck warm in no time easily adjusted for any length and width this single stitch cowl is a sinch you can use any weight yarn and hook - i have used dk yarn and a 5 5mm hook i recommend using a slightly larger hook than your yarn recommends i will add pics and details of different weight yarns and hook sizes as i make them please feel free to leave a comment or message i would love to hear your feedback visit https //www facebook com/missyddesigns and leave a photo of your completed cowl enjoy
